entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
